https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ugtuS84LU7K6SDbTgtIBVdPLiSx.jpg The Peruvian army captain Pantaleon Pantoja, a very serious and efficient officer, is chosen by his superiors to set up a special service of 'visitors' to satisfy the sexual needs of the soldiers posted on remote jungle outposts. Captain Pantoja and the Special Services
